elmin Gergas was an inhabitant of the City of Coin, Athkatla, in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Belmin was a gray-haired man who harbored hatred for elves and a mere sight of drow filled him with violent vitriol.
Belmin Gergas frequented the the grand market in Athkatlas Center District â€“ Waukeens Promenade in the . He could be found ranting about the evils of elves by a decorative fountain outside the Promenade, blaming all the recent strive on the Fair Folk. He did not hesitate to verbally assault elven and half-elven men an women who crossed his path and physically assaulted any drow he encountered.
